name: Music Audio Toolkit
description: Toolkit skill providing common audio utilities such as audio transcription that can be reused by other skills.

transcribe_audio.description: Transcribe audio to text using the configured provider (e.g., faster_whisper, openai_audio).

audio_path.description: Path to the audio file to transcribe (optional when called from other skills that manage audio context).

dub_audio.description: Dub audio or video into a different language using ElevenLabs AI dubbing.

audio_path.description: Path to the audio or video file to dub (optional when called from other skills that manage audio context).

target_language.description: Target language code for dubbing (e.g., 'es' for Spanish, 'fr' for French, 'zh' for Chinese).

split_instrumental_vocal.description: Split audio into instrumental and vocal tracks using Ultimate Vocal Remover ONNX.

audio_path.description: Path to the audio file to split.
